scripts.docker:restart:hard: npm run docker:rm && npm run docker:init
scripts.ovpn:genconfig: sudo docker run -v $PWD/data:/etc/openvpn --log-driver=none --rm kylemanna/openvpn ovpn_genconfig -u udp://128.199.191.225:1194 -n 1.1.1.1 -n 1.0.0.1
scripts.ovpn:easyrsa: sudo docker run -v $PWD/data:/etc/openvpn --log-driver=none --rm -it kylemanna/openvpn easyrsa build-client-full admin
scripts.ovpn:getclient: sudo docker run -v $PWD/data:/etc/openvpn --log-driver=none --rm kylemanna/openvpn ovpn_getclient admin > $PWD/clients/admin.ovpn
scripts.ovpn:setup: npm run ovpn:genconfig && npm run ovpn:initpki && npm run docker:init && npm run ovpn:easyrsa && npm run ovpn:getclient
